pr_title: Fix and tweak how resource reload listeners are added

timeline.bodyText: Because this is in an interface, this is public, it should not be.
timeline.author: covers1624

timeline.bodyText: Why are the imports in this file changing?
timeline.author: pupnewfster

timeline.bodyText: Might want to emphasize this is for server reload listeners. Only clue in the javadoc is the link to data pack registries, but I could see someone getting confused and trying to use this for the client side resource pack reload listeners.
timeline.author: KnightMiner

timeline.bodyText:
Forge has its own internal handler, so this shouldn't have this weird meta instance thing...
What is the point of people having access to the instance?
timeline.author: LexManos

replies.bodyText: used here https://github.com/MinecraftForge/MinecraftForge/blob/1.16.x/src/main/java/net/minecraftforge/common/ForgeHooks.java#L1169 but commented for now. I can put this in the InternalHandler if its better suited.
replies.author: Cyborgmas

replies.bodyText: Yes this should be moved to the internal handler as there is no sense in exposing a modder facing API if we can avoid it when it comes to internal instances of things.
replies.author: pupnewfster
